::Zardus/DeathStorm::

DeathStorm enters the engine room, still grinning to himself. His victory was 
at hand! He walks up to a computer panel, about to place the explosive on the 
underside of it.

"You are doing research, I trust?"

DeathStorm spins around, his eyes going wide as he sees Zardus, the leader's 
gun aimed at his chest. DeathStorm stumbles back as a shot hits him in the 
chest, sending him slamming backwards into the panel.

With extroadanary speed, DeathStorm pulls out the black device he had made in 
his ship, the device releasing a beam of energy at Zardus. Zardus yells as he 
is forced back into his beast mode.

DeathStorm laughs. "How do you like it, 'leader'? Transformation block. My 
own design."

DeathStorm lifts his gun, pointing it at Zardus.
